Ruby.name: 红宝石
Ruby.description: 在燃指峰的一个箱子里发现的一颗红宝石。

Sapphire.name: 蓝宝石
Sapphire.description: 在正义营地的便坑里发现的一块蓝宝石，其所属者是一名死去的圣殿骑士。

Wand of Fear.name: 恐惧魔杖
Wand of Fear.description:
魔杖（需同调）

该魔杖有 7 发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 1d6 + 1 发已消耗的充能。当充能耗尽时，骰一次 [[/r 1d20]]。如果骰值为 1，魔杖将化为灰烬而毁灭。

命令。持握此魔杖时，你可以用一个动作并消耗 1 发充能以命令一名生物逃跑或趴下（如同@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.arzCrMRgcNiQuh43]{命令术}，豁免 DC 15）。

恐惧力场。持握此魔杖时，你可以用一个动作并消耗 2 发充能，令魔杖尖端发出 60 尺锥状的橙光。锥状区域内的每名生物必须成功通过一次 DC 15 的感知豁免否则对你恐慌 1 分钟。因此效应恐慌的生物每轮必须以其移动力尽可能远离你且无法自愿进入你周围 30 尺范围内。使用自己的动作时，它只能执行疾走动作或是尝试逃离某种阻止它移动的效应。它无法执行反应。如果无处可逃，则它会可以执行闪避动作。受此效应影响的生物在其每轮结束时可以再次尝试豁免，成功则终止自己身上的相关效应。

Pouch (10 gp).name: 钱包（10 GP）
Pouch (10 gp).description: 一个布袋或皮袋最多可容纳 20 发弹弓子弹或 50 支吹箭针等物品。用于存放法术材料的分隔式袋子被称为材料袋。一个袋子最多可容纳 1/5 立方尺或 6 磅的装备。

Spell Scroll: Purify Food and Drink.name: 法术卷轴：净化食粮
Spell Scroll: Purify Food and Drink.description:
1 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

你指定施法距离内一点，净化指定点周围半径 5 尺球状区域内的非魔法饮食品，并驱除其浸染的所有毒素和疾病。

Arrow +1.name: 箭矢 +1
Arrow +1.description:
适用于各种弓箭的弹药。它被注入了魔力。

你使用此魔法弹药进行的攻击和伤害检定将获得加值。一旦命中目标，该弹药就不再具有魔法属性。

Sephirius’s Pouch.name: 塞菲留斯的小包
Sephirius’s Pouch.description: 一个布袋或皮袋最多可容纳 20 发弹弓子弹或 50 支吹箭针等物品。用于存放法术材料的分隔式袋子被称为材料袋。一个袋子最多可容纳 1/5 立方尺或 6 磅的装备。

Lord Brixton’s Pouch.name: 布里克斯顿勋爵的小包

Potion of Healing.name: 治疗药水
Potion of Healing.description:
药水的红色液体在摇晃时会闪闪发光。/em>

当你饮下这瓶药水时恢复 2d4 + 2 生命值。

Opal.name: 蛋白石
Opal.description: 在正义营地的便坑里发现的一块蛋白石，其所属者是一名死去的圣殿骑士。

Leatherworker's Tools.name: 皮匠工具
Leatherworker's Tools.description:
这些工具包含皮匠所需的物品。

如果你熟练掌握某种工匠工具，则可将你的熟练加值加到你使用该工具进行任何工艺工作的属性检定上。每种工匠工具所需的熟练度各不相同。

Longsword.name: 长剑
Longsword.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]或双手使用造成[[/damage twoHanded average]]伤害。

这把剑具有一种微弱的魔法属性：持有者能获得说和理解龙语的能力。

4vWnKFrBQcYr179F.name: 蓝宝石
4vWnKFrBQcYr179F.description: 在燃指峰的一个箱子里发现的一颗蓝宝石。

Torch.name: 火把
Torch.description: 火把点燃后能够燃烧 1 小时，燃烧期间发出 20 尺半径的明亮光照和额外 20 尺的微光光照。当你执行攻击动作时，你可以将火把当作简易近战武器，并使用火把发动攻击。命中时，目标受到 1 点火焰伤害。

Arrow.name: 箭矢
Arrow.description: 各种弓的标准弹药。这些普通的箭由光滑的木箭杆、鹅毛箭羽和锤形金属箭头制成。

Dwarven Battleaxe +1.name: 矮人战斧 +1
Dwarven Battleaxe +1.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]或双手使用造成[[/damage twoHanded average]]伤害。

该武器能在水上和其他液体上漂浮，使持有者在进行力量（运动）检定游泳时获得优势。战斧的柄上刻着矮人语的德特赫克符文，拼出了这件武器的名字：鲍勃。

Dark Blue Crystal Eye.name: 深蓝色水晶眼球
Dark Blue Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中的艾金之墓发现的这颗深蓝色水晶眼球。

Spell Scroll: Fabricate.name: 法术卷轴：鬼斧神工
Spell Scroll: Fabricate.description:
4 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

你将一种原材料转化成该材料制作的成品。例如，你可以将一丛树木转化为一座木桥，一把麻草化为绳子，或是将亚麻和羊毛化作衣物。

指定施法距离内你能看见的原材料。只要有足够的材料，你就可以将他们转化为一件体型不超过大型的物件（至多占据 10 尺立方区域或八个相邻的 5 尺立方区域）。如果你的目标材料是金属、石料或者其他矿石材料，那么被制造的物件不能大于中型（至多占据 5 尺立方区域），制成品的质量和原材料质量相同。

该法术不能创造生物或魔法物品。你只有对制作某物品的工匠工具拥有熟练时，才能使用此法术去制作相应需要高工艺水平制作的物品，如武器、护甲等。

Zaroum Al-Sarya Scimitar.name: 扎如姆·艾萨亚克弯刀
Zaroum Al-Sarya Scimitar.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]。

这把弯刀的刀柄上镶嵌着宝石，靠近缠绕的刀柄处较窄，但向闪闪发光的刀尖处逐渐变宽。

Wooden Map Case.name: 木制地图盒
Wooden Map Case.description: 一个木箱，里面装着一张通往废墟或地牢的地图。

Hempen Rope (50 ft.).name: 麻绳 (50 尺)
Hempen Rope (50 ft.).description: 麻质或者丝质的绳索，拥有 2 点生命值，且可以通过一次成功的DC 17 力量检定扯断。

Pink Crystal Eye.name: 粉红色水晶眼球
Pink Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中的魔像陷坑发现的这颗粉红色水晶眼球。

Potion of Greater Healing.name: 高等治疗药水
Potion of Greater Healing.description:
药水的红色液体在摇晃时会闪闪发光。

当你喝下这瓶药水时，你会恢复 4d4 + 4 点生命值。

Bigby's Hand (Ice).name: 毕格比之手（冰）
Bigby's Hand (Ice).description:
你在施法距离内指定一处你能看见且未被占据的空间，并在该处创造出一只闪烁着微光的大型手掌。巨手在法术持续时间内维持存在，并听从你的命令进行移动，模仿你自己手掌的各类动作。

巨手是一个物件，其 AC 为 20，其生命值等于你的生命值上限。如果它的生命值降至 0 则法术将提前终止。其力量属性为 26（+8），敏捷属性为 10（+0）。巨手并不会充满其所在的空间。

施展此法术时，你可以令巨手移动至多 60 尺远并造成下列效应之一。你也可以在自己随后的回合里以一个附赠动作再造成下列效应之一。

金刚拳 Clenched Fist。 巨手对自身周围 5 尺范围内的一个生物（或物件）发动一次打击。此时，巨掌用你的游戏数据发动一次近战法术攻击，此次攻击命中时目标将受到 4d8 点力场伤害。

飞击掌 。 巨手尝试推撞自身周围 5 尺范围内的一个生物。你使用巨手的力量属性进行一次属性检定，与目标的力量（运动）检定作对抗。如果目标的体型不超过中型，则你的检定具有优势。若你胜出对抗时，目标将目标推动 5+你施法属性调整值的五倍 尺（方向由你选择）。巨手将随着目标一起移动，保持自己处在目标周围 5 尺的范围内。

擒拿掌。 巨手尝试对自身周围 5 尺范围内的一个体型不超过巨型的生物进行擒抱。你使用巨手的力量属性值来处理本次擒抱。如果目标的体型不超过中型，则你的检定具有优势。在巨手擒抱目标期间，你可以使用一个附赠动作命令巨手对其进行挤压，此时目标将受到 2d6 + 你的施法属性调整值 点钝击伤害。

护身掌。 你选择一个生物，巨手将持续阻挡在你与该生物中间，直到你给他新的命令为止。巨手不断移动以保持其始终处于你与目标中间，使得相对目标而言，你具有半身掩护。如果目标的力量值小于或等于巨手的力量值，则其无法穿过巨手的阻挡。而如果其力量值高于巨手，则目标可以穿过巨手所在的空间向你走来，不过该空间对该目标而言视为困难地形。

materials.value: 一块蛋壳和一只蛇鳞手套

Emerald.name: 绿宝石
Emerald.description: 在正义营地的便坑里发现的一块绿宝石，其所属者是一名死去的圣殿骑士。

Quiver.name: 箭袋
Quiver.description: 该箭袋最多能装 20 支箭。它是一个黑色皮制箭袋，上面绣着一颗镶嵌着石英的星图。它是在暗夜巨蛇神殿中芬萨札的房间被发现的。

Small Knife.name: 小刀
Small Knife.description: 学者们用来开启信件与文书往来的钝刀。

Pouch (25 gp).name: 钱包（25 GP）
Pouch (25 gp).description: 一个布袋或皮袋最多可容纳 20 发弹弓子弹或 50 支吹箭针等物品。用于存放法术材料的分隔式袋子被称为材料袋。一个袋子最多可容纳 1/5 立方尺或 6 磅的装备。

Leather-bound Diary.name: 皮面日记本
Leather-bound Diary.description: 一本书可能包含诗歌、历史记载、特定文化领域的信息、关于侏儒装置的图表和注释，或者几乎任何可以用文字或图片表示的内容。

Onyx Gemstone.name: 玛瑙宝石
Onyx Gemstone.description: 在姆巴拉高原的普普奶奶的茅屋里，在人皮口袋里发现的玛瑙宝石。

Explorer's Pack.name: 探索套组
Explorer's Pack.description: 一个背包可以容纳一立方尺或 30 磅的装备。你还可以将一些物品（例如铺盖卷或绳子）绑在背包外面。

Spell Scroll: Commune with Nature.name: 法术卷轴：问道自然
Spell Scroll: Commune with Nature.description:
5 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

你短暂的成为大自然的一部分并以此获得周围地形的信息。在户外时，该法术可以让你了解 3 里内大地的状况。在洞穴和其他天然地下场所中，其范围缩小为 300 尺半径区域内。自然环境中被建筑覆盖的区域里（比如地下城或城镇中）法术无法生效。

你立即获得的自然资讯至多与该地域三个方面的主题相关，在以下项目中进行选择：

  • 地形和水体
  • 区域内分布的植物，矿物，动物或人物
  • 强大的天界生物，精类生物，邪魔，元素生物或者不死生物
  • 受其他存在位面的影响
  • 建筑物

例如，你可以侦测到某个强大不死生物在区域中的位置，干净安全的水源所在地，以及附近城镇的方位。

Tinderbox.name: 火绒盒
Tinderbox.description: 火绒盒是一种装有打火石、火镰和火绒（通常是浸泡在燃油里的干布料）的小型容器，其中的物品可以用来点火。使用它来点燃蜡烛、油灯、提灯或火把——或任何其他暴露燃料的东西——需要一个动作。点燃任何其他火需要 1 分钟。

Serpent Venom (Injury).name: 蛇毒（损伤）
Serpent Venom (Injury).description:
这种毒素必须从死亡或失能的巨型毒蛇.身上采集。受到该毒素影响的生物必须进行[[/save format=long]]，豁免失败则受到[[/damage average]]伤害，豁免成功则仅受半伤。

损伤。损伤毒素可以涂抹在武器、弹药、陷阱部件和其他造成穿刺或挥砍伤害的物件上，并且在通过伤口注入或被洗掉之前一直保持效力。受到涂有这种毒素的物件造成的穿刺或挥砍伤害的生物会受到其影响。

IZiP1h922lWl4kXg.name: 绿宝石
IZiP1h922lWl4kXg.description: 在独角鲸号残骸里发现的一块祖母绿宝石。

Amulet of Health.name: 健康护符
Amulet of Health.description:
奇物，珍稀（需同调）

佩戴此护符期间，你的体质变为 19。如果你的体质在未佩戴护符时已经大于或等于 19，则护符不会起效。

Amulet of Health.name: 健康护符
Amulet of Health.description: 你的体质变为 19。如果你的体质在未佩戴护符时已经大于或等于 19，则护符不会起效。

Necklace of Fireballs.name: 火球项链
Necklace of Fireballs.description:
奇物

这条项链上挂着 1d6 + 3 颗珠子。你可以用一个动作取下一颗珠子并投掷到至多 60 尺远的地方。它将在移动轨迹的终点爆炸，效果等同于 3 环的 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]{火球术} （豁免 DC 15）。

你可以在同一次动作中，一次取下并投掷多枚珠子，甚至直接丢出整条项链。同时投掷出的珠子数量每有 1 颗，火球术的环阶也增加 1 环。

Foundry 备注

9充能代表可能存在的最大珠子数量，请根据实际情况调整。"其他公式"按钮可用于投掷额外珠子造成的追加伤害。

根据剩余珠子数量的建议价格表（仅供参考，请 DM 根据世界观调整）：

Number of BeadsPrice (gp)
830,720
715,360
67680

3960
2480
1300

Bravus’s Belt Pouch.name: 布拉维斯的腰包
Bravus’s Belt Pouch.description: 一个材料小包是一个小型的防水皮甲腰带小包，有隔层用来存放施展法术所需的所有材料部件和其他特殊物品，但不包括那些有特定消耗的成分（如法术描述中所指出的）。

Trapped Chest.name: 陷阱宝箱
Trapped Chest.description: 宝箱内衬有一层铅，里边装着 300 GP 和一个黄金酒杯（250 GP）。酒杯上刻着一张悲伤的脸，当酒杯注满时，这张脸会露出微笑。箱中还有一个塞住的骨制卷轴匣，里边放着一张移除诅咒法术卷轴。

Spell Scroll: Arcane Gate.name: 法术卷轴：秘法门
Spell Scroll: Arcane Gate.description:
6 环&Reference[Spell Scroll], Requires Concentration

你创造两个相连的传送门。指定地面上你能看见的两处未被占据的大型空间，其中一点在法术距离内，另一点则在你身边 10 尺内。随后将会开启一个通往两处的圆形传送门，并持续到法术结束。

传送门边缘为闪烁的二维环形，其内布满遮挡视野的迷雾，且整个垂直地悬浮在离地几寸处。传送门单面开启（由你选择），那一面即是传送门生效的一面。

任何进入其中一个传送门的东西将从另一个传送门里出现，如同两个传送门邻接一样。以一个附赠动作，你可以改变其开门的朝向。

affects.special: 一个在 10 尺内，另一个在 500 尺内

Petrified Grung Egg.name: 石化格龙蛙人蛋
Petrified Grung Egg.description:
奇物，（需施法者同调）

该石化格龙蛙人蛋（法力再生珍珠）在你身上时，你可以用一个动作说出珍珠的命令语以恢复一个已消耗的法术位。如果已消耗的法术位为 4 环或更高环阶，则所恢复的法术位为 3 环。使用后直到次日黎明前，珍珠都无法再次启动。

Foundry Note

已设置一个主动效应，为你的角色卡添加毒素伤害抗性。

Poison Damage Resistance.name: 毒素伤害抗性
Poison Damage Resistance.description: 与石化格龙蛙人蛋同调的施法者将获得毒素伤害抗性。

Tiger Eye Gem.name: 虎眼宝石
Tiger Eye Gem.description: 在奥姆城里，在沃伊的皮质腰包里发现的一颗虎眼宝石。

Amethyst.name: 紫水晶
Amethyst.description: 在正义营地的便坑里发现的一块紫水晶，其所属者是一名死去的圣殿骑士。

Mess Kit.name: 野炊工具
Mess Kit.description: 一个野炊工具锡盒包括一只茶杯和一些简易餐具。盒子被夹在一起，并且其中一面能够被用作一只煎锅而另一面则可以作为一只碟子或是浅碗。

Potion of Poison.name: 剧毒药水
Potion of Poison.description:
这种药水看起来、闻起来、和尝起来都和 治疗药水potion of healing 或其他增益药水差不多。

但实际上，它是用幻术伪装过的毒药。只有法术鉴定术可以鉴定出它的本质。

饮用此药水后，你立刻受到 3d6 点毒素伤害，且必须通过一次DC 13 的体质豁免，豁免失败将陷入中毒。中毒期间每次你的回合开始时，你受到 3d6 点毒素伤害。每次你的回合结束时你可以再次尝试豁免。如果豁免成功，则你在接下来的回合中受点毒素伤害减少 1d6。当毒素伤害降低至 0 时，毒药效应终止。

Foundry Note

若要应用成功进行体质豁免检定所减少的伤害，请按需使用其他公式（设定为 1d6）。

Jewelry Box.name: 珠宝盒
Jewelry Box.description: 这个形似蟑螂的珠宝盒由黄金制成，镶嵌着珍贵的宝石（包括用作蟑螂眼的微型黑珍珠）。

Pale Green Crystal Eye.name: 翠绿色水晶眼球
Pale Green Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中的魔像陷坑发现的这颗翠绿色水晶眼球。

Squash Stew.name: 炖南瓜
Squash Stew.description:
角色感觉更健康了，其体质豁免具有优势。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效应（AE），用作提示，但不会自动化上述增益。

Scarlet Crystal Eye.name: 猩红水晶眼球
Scarlet Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中发现的这颗猩红水晶眼球。

Book of Lore.name: 典籍之书
Book of Lore.description: 一本包含历史、特定领域学识、神话或传说内容的典籍。

Folding Boat.name: 折叠船
Folding Boat.description:
奇物，珍稀

该物件外观看起来是个长 12 寸，宽 6 寸，深 6 寸的木盒。它重 4 磅且能在水面上漂浮，也可以像普通木盒一样装东西。该物品有三个命令语，说出一个命令语需要一个动作。

第一个命令语能使盒子展开成一条长 10 尺，宽 4 尺，深 2 尺的小船 boat。小船有一对桨、一个锚、一根桅杆和一面三角帆。它最多可以搭乘四名中型体型的生物。

第二个命令语能使盒子展开成一条长 24 尺，宽 8 尺，深 6 尺的船 ship。这艘船有一块甲板、划桨座、五对桨、一个舵桨、一个锚、一个甲板舱以及一根装有横帆的桅杆。它最多可以搭乘 15 名中型体型的生物。

木盒展开成船只时，它的重量也变为对应船只应有的重量。原本存放在木盒中的东西将留在船内。

当没有生物在折叠船上时，第三个命令语能使展开的船只变回木盒。船内无法装入木盒中的物件会在折叠时留在外面，可以装入木盒的物件则会留在盒内。

OCLoYH00QB3gRg0V.name: 绿宝石
OCLoYH00QB3gRg0V.description: 在燃指峰的一个箱子里发现的一颗绿宝石。

Spellbook (1-3).name: 法术书（1-3）
Spellbook (1-3).description:
硬皮封面的法术书是法师们的必须品，为方便记录法术，其通常都留有 100 张羊皮纸空书页。

这本法术书包含了从 1 环到 3 环的共 [[/r 1d6]] 个法术。

OwY6ON0Gfhos4Ok0.name: 紫水晶
OwY6ON0Gfhos4Ok0.description: 在燃指峰的一个箱子里发现的一颗紫水晶。

Acererak’s Scepter.name: 阿瑟瑞克的节杖
Acererak’s Scepter.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]。

王座上的节杖由实心铁制成，杖首为精金材质。

Cartographer's Tools.name: 制图工具
Cartographer's Tools.description:
这些特殊工具包含了从事制图工艺或行业所需的物品。

掌握一套工匠工具的熟练度，可让你在使用该工具进行手艺制作时，将熟练加值加入任何相关的属性检定中。每种工匠工具都需要单独的熟练项。

Ink Pen.name: 墨水笔
Ink Pen.description: 与墨水结合使用以在纸上书写或绘画的设备。

Green Crystal Eye.name: 淡绿色水晶眼球
Green Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中的映像走廊发现的这颗淡绿色水晶眼球。

Rotten Leather Quiver.name: 腐烂的皮质箭袋
Rotten Leather Quiver.description: 一个腐烂的皮质箭袋可以装多达 20 支箭。

Spell Scroll: Tiny Hut.name: 法术卷轴：李欧蒙小屋
Spell Scroll: Tiny Hut.description:
3 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

一个半径 10 尺的半球形力场出现在你周围和上方，并在法术持续时间内保持固定。当你离开该区域时法术将随之终止。

半球可以容纳你和九个中型或更小的生物。如果区域内容纳了一个体型更大的生物或者容纳了多于九个生物，则法术失效。在施展此法术时即处于半球内的生物和物件可以自由进出半球。而所有其他生物和物件都将被阻挡而无法进出。法术和其他魔法效应既无法延伸至穿过半球，也无法直接穿过半球施放。半球内的空气干爽舒适，而无论外侧气候如何。

你可以在法术终止前使半球内的光照变为微光或黑暗。半球从外侧看是不透明的，并且呈现出由你选定的颜色，但从内侧看它则是透明的。

UcZy9DNXQEV848Uy.name: 红宝石
UcZy9DNXQEV848Uy.description: 在南吉落尔花园的宝塔中发现的一颗红宝石。

Three-Dragon Ante Cards.name: 三龙牌卡牌
Three-Dragon Ante Cards.description:
此物品包含了多种牌类，包括未标记的和有标记的牌类。

如果你熟练掌握了某个游戏套装，你可以将你的熟练加值加到使用该套装进行游戏的属性检定上。每种游戏套装都需要单独的熟练等级。

Devlin’s Spellbook.name: 戴夫林的法术书
Devlin’s Spellbook.description:
这本法术书是一本用皮革装订的厚书，里面记载了以下的法术咒语：

一环：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7p9IuWrSWFgfyQo2]{警报术}， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4dSvfvTy2ZIJ3K4k]{通晓语言}， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{侦测魔法}， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zPGohqJRir6MyQ3U]{脚底抹油}， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3OZnNhunvRtPOQmH]{鉴定术}， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.82jM6qD9axLJsTrH]{迷幻手稿}， 睡眠术， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.bnjXlk13ZRJuf5d0]{谭森浮碟术}

二环：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8cse7rit0oswRPUP]{秘法锁}， 匕首之云（玩家手册 2014），@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.FjYE214HTERCRZNm]{炽焰法球}， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1nhIxh0DsJsntCfj]{敲击术}

三环：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8]{解除魔法}， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]{火球术}

Voj’s Spellbook.name: 沃伊的法术书
Voj’s Spellbook.description:
在奥博娜卡神社中发现的红色巫师沃伊的法术书，里面记载了以下的法术咒语：

Cantrips: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.EOmsUcFQJTfG2oio]{火焰箭}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Bnn9Nzajixvow9xi]{光亮术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]{法师之手}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.udsLtG0BugXHR2JQ]{prestidigitation}

1 环法术：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{侦测魔法}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CKZTpZlxj7hjjo2H]{法师护甲}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]{魔法飞弹}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsterfeatures.Item.yHcr3vlkmtInELj2]{护盾术}

2 环法术：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]{迷踪步}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4]{暗示术}

3 环法术：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Ek45cBpVXvJdv1Qy]{法术反制}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]{火球术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.yfbK8gZqESlaoY5t]{飞行术}

4 环法术：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.tEpDmYZNGc9f5OhJ]{高等隐形术}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH]{冰风暴}

5 环法术：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA]{寒冰锥}

White Crystal Eye.name: 珍珠白水晶眼球
White Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中发现的这颗珍珠白水晶眼球。

Archaeologist's Map.name: 考古学家的地图
Archaeologist's Map.description: 一座废墟或地下城的地图

Spiral Horn.name: 灵魂独角
Spiral Horn.description:
魔杖，珍稀（需施法者同调）

这只号角（即惊异魔杖）拥有 7 发充能。持握它时，你可以使用动作消耗 1 发充能，并选择你 120 尺内的一个目标。目标可以是生物、物件或空间中的某一点。掷@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables.RollTable.X03rbSjVcNNJNqa8]{惊异魔杖}表以决定发生的效果。

若效果使你从魔杖中施放一道法术，该法术的豁免DC 为 15。若该法术的正常射程以尺计且不足 120 尺，则其射程变为 120 尺。若效应覆盖区域，你必须以目标为中心并包含该目标。若效应有多个可能目标，由 GM 随机决定哪些目标受影响。

魔杖每日黎明时恢复 1d6 + 1 发已消耗的充能。若你耗尽魔杖的最后一发充能，则掷一次 d20。若结果为 1，魔杖化为尘土并被摧毁。

Red Library Treasure.name: 血红图书馆宝藏
Red Library Treasure.description:
奥登罗斯魔的角框眼镜并无魔法，但价值 250 GP。这副眼镜还是一把“门钥”，可打开印记城中的一道传送门——那是一道通往世外桃源位面的双向门。对眼镜施展@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.W4Qx5z0id6da0vqg]{通晓传奇}可获悉此信息；若将其出售给法师或智者，潜在价值可升至 2,500 GP。

桌上的物件是一只黑木金丝的音乐盒。以@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ghXTfe7sgCbgf1Q8]{侦测魔法}或类似效应可探测出其咒法系魔法灵光。盒子的五个侧面各雕有一位长角女子演奏不同乐器的形象：扬琴、长笛、竖琴、里拉琴与小提琴。触碰盒子的生物可用一个动作令盒子播放其中一种乐器的音乐，乐声可在 60 尺外听到；也可用动作停止音乐。音乐盒价值 750 gp。

图书馆收藏：

  • 历史文献 200 册，每册 50 gp
  • 奥法知识巨著 60 册，每册 100 gp
  • 落满灰尘的法术卷轴 3 张：唤起死灵、鬼斧神工、复生术
  • 法术书 6 本：
    • 前 3 本：1—3 环法术，每环 1d6 个
    • 第 4—5 本：4—6 环法术，每环 1d4 个
    • 第 6 本《X 秘法之书》（书脊烫字）：7—9 环法术，每环 1d3 个

Robe of Scintillating Colors.name: 虹光法袍
Robe of Scintillating Colors.description:
奇物（需同调）

这件长袍有 3 发充能，且每天黎明时恢复 1d3 发已消耗的充能。着装这件长袍期间，你可以用一个动作并消耗 1 发充能，让长袍不断显现不断变幻出各种耀眼的图像。直到你的下回合结束前，长袍提供 30 尺的明亮光照和额外 30 尺的微光光照，能看到你的生物对你发动的攻击检定具有劣势。另外，在你启用长袍效应时，任何处于长袍产生的明亮光照区域内，且可以看到你的生物必须通过一次 DC 15 的感知豁免，豁免失败将陷入震慑直到长袍的效应终止。

Queen Napaka’s Scepter.name: 娜帕卡女王的节杖
Queen Napaka’s Scepter.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]。

王座上的节杖由实心铁制成，杖首为精金材质。

Herbalism Kit.name: 草药工具
Herbalism Kit.description: 一整副的工具包里包含一系列器具如钳剪、杵磨、袋子、瓶子，以供草药师制作药膏和药水。拥有草药工具熟练项的角色，在使用该工具进行鉴别或应用草药的属性检定时，可以将其熟练加值加入检定结果中。另外，你要拥有草药工具的熟练项才可制作抗毒剂或治疗药水。

Waterskin.name: 水袋
Waterskin.description: 由皮革缝制而成，最多可装 4 品脱液体。装满时约为 5 磅。一品脱水大约 1 磅。

Spell Scroll: Lesser Restoration.name: 法术卷轴：次级复原术
Spell Scroll: Lesser Restoration.description:
2 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Red Crystal Eye.name: 红色水晶眼球
Red Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中发现的这颗红色水晶眼球。

eK7IWNGLlvhAPYIR.name: 箭袋
eK7IWNGLlvhAPYIR.description: 一个箭袋可以装多达 20 支箭。

Spell Scroll: Protection from Evil and G.name: 法术卷轴：防护善恶（亡灵）
Spell Scroll: Protection from Evil and G.description:
1 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]，需专注

法术结束前，你使触及的一名自愿生物获得仅针对亡灵的防护。

此防护提供下述几种增益。上述生物类型的生物对目标的攻击检定具有劣势。目标不能被其附身，也不会因其陷入魅惑或恐慌状态。如果目标已经被具有上述生物类型的生物附身，或其魅惑或恐慌状态影响，目标后续进行的相关效应的豁免检定也将具有优势。

Ras Nsi’s Spellbook.name: 拉兹·纳斯的法术书
Ras Nsi’s Spellbook.description:
这本法术书是一本用皮革装订的厚书，里面记载了他所准备的所有法术咒语。

戏法（随意）：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.vrN18tbTw7io5MWd]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.EOmsUcFQJTfG2oio]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kjmjY0zlE6IEiQVL]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.g2u9PYfqWQAyg9OI]

1 环（4 法术位）: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zPGohqJRir6MyQ3U]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.7e3QXF10hLNDEdr6]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.41JIhpDyM9Anm7cs]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.sSs3hSzkKBMNBgTs]

2 环（3 法术位）: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zwGsAv6kmwzYGhh3]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wqfAVANuQonNBgnL]

3 环（3 法术位）: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.oyE5nVppa5mde5gT]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Ek45cBpVXvJdv1Qy]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ztgcdrWPshKRpFd0]

4 环 （3 法术位）: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pybg5MNc3lkerH4Y]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]

5 环（2 法术位）: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.dSTu1MaPhBqPITwM]， @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JQyigMNPiDnGI18b]

6 环 （1 法术位）: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.E4NXux0RHvME1XgP]

Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals.name: 命令水元素水钵
Bowl of Commanding Water Elementals.description:
奇物，珍稀

只要这只水钵盛满水，你就可以使用一个动作说出其命令字，召唤一只@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.namJz755U1EhvEJa]{水元素}，效果如同你施展了@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1LkZvINag7KqBmDR]{召唤元素生物}。下次黎明前，水钵无法再次以该方式使用。

水钵直径约 1 尺，深约半尺，重 3 磅，可装约 3 加仑水。

Spell Scroll: Create Undead.name: 法术卷轴：唤起死灵
Spell Scroll: Create Undead.description:
6 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

你只能在夜晚施展这道法术。选择施法距离内至多三具中型或小型类人生物尸体。每具尸体都会变为一只你控制下的食尸鬼（DM有这些生物的游戏数据）。

在每个你的回合用一个附赠动作，你能精神性地命令任何距你 120 尺内以此法术活化的生物（如果你操纵多个生物，则你的命令可以同时传达给它们中的任意成员，不过只能使用同一种命令）。你决定生物下回合使用何种动作并决定它们移动至何处，抑或你可以下达宽泛的命令，例如守护某个房间或某条走廊。没有接受到你命令的生物则只会采取回避 动作并只会为了避免受伤而移动。一旦被下达命令，该生物会持续执行命令直到任务完成。

你只能操纵生物 24 小时，在那之后它会拒绝执行你曾下达的任何命令。若你在当前的 24 小时时间段终止前再次施展此法术，则你对该生物的操纵时间再延长 24 小时。法术的此种用法只能延长你对至多三个你使用此法术所创造生物的控制时间，不会造出新的生物。

升环施法：使用七环法术位施展该法术时，你可以唤起并维持四只食尸鬼。使用八环法术位施展该法术时，你可以唤起并维持五只食尸鬼，也可以改为唤起并维持两只妖鬼，或两只尸鬼。当你使用九环法术位施展该法术时，你可以唤起并维持六只食尸鬼 , 也可以改为唤起并维持三只妖鬼，或三只尸妖, 或两只木乃伊。

summon.condition: 你只能在夜晚施展该法术。

Vibrant Purple Crystal Eye.name: 亮紫色水晶眼球
Vibrant Purple Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中的艾金之墓发现的这颗亮紫色水晶眼球。

Spell Scroll: Knock.name: 法术卷轴：敲击术
Spell Scroll: Knock.description:
2 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

指定施法距离内一个你能看见的物件。该物件可以是一扇门，一个盒子，一个箱子，一副镣铐，一把挂锁，或是一个其他的通过魔法或普通手段来防止被打开的物件。

被一把普通锁锁住的目标其锁会被解开，被卡死的目标会被松开，被闩住的目标会被打开。如果目标被多把锁锁住，则只有一把锁会被打开。

若你指定的目标被法术秘法锁锁住，则该秘法锁被压制 10 分钟，这段时间内目标可被正常开启和关闭。

施展该法术时，受术目标会发出一声响亮的敲击声，其声响最远 300 尺内都能听见。

Bag of Sand.name: 沙包
Bag of Sand.description: 一种小型沙袋，文人用来快速且安全地吸干刚蘸墨的信件和文书，以便迅速寄发。

Orange Crystal Eye.name: 白炽橙色水晶眼球
Orange Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中发现的这颗白炽橙色水晶眼球。

Spell Scroll: Remove Curse.name: 法术卷轴：移除诅咒
Spell Scroll: Remove Curse.description:
3 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

你触及一名生物或一个物件，使影响其的所有诅咒终止。如果该物件是一件诅咒魔法物品，则其上的诅咒不会因此解除，不过该法术可以打破诅咒物品与其所有者之间的同调，使其所有者可以将其卸下或丢弃。

Roast Boar.name: 烤野猪
Roast Boar.description:
[[lookup @name]]感觉更强壮了，其力量检定具有优势。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效应（AE），用作提示，但不会自动化上述增益。

X the Mystic’s Arcane Grimoire.name: X 秘法之书
X the Mystic’s Arcane Grimoire.description:
硬皮封面的法术书是法师们的必须品，为方便记录法术，其通常都留有 100 张羊皮纸空书页。

这本法术书包含了从 7 环到 9 环的共 [[/r 1d6]] 个法术。

mPZRoQDDDeURSFwL.name: 蓝宝石
mPZRoQDDDeURSFwL.description: 在南吉落尔花园的宝塔中发现的一颗蓝宝石。

Spellbook (4-6).name: 法术书（4-6）
Spellbook (4-6).description:
硬皮封面的法术书是法师们的必须品，为方便记录法术，其通常都留有 100 张羊皮纸空书页。

这本法术书包含了从 4 环到 6 环的共 [[/r 1d6]] 个法术。

Scholar's Pack.name: 学者套组
Scholar's Pack.description: 一个背包可以容纳一立方尺或 30 磅的装备。你还可以将一些物品（例如铺盖卷或绳子）绑在背包外面。

Ceremonial Dagger.name: 仪式匕首
Ceremonial Dagger.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]。

这把仪式匕首收在金质刀鞘中，鞘上浮雕着一群在丛林中狂奔的野兽。它是在暗夜巨蛇神殿中芬萨札的房间被发现的。

Rations.name: 口粮
Rations.description: 适合长途旅行携带的高能量干粮，包括牛肉干、干果、饼干和坚果等。

Malison’s Longbow.name: 恶咒长弓
Malison’s Longbow.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage extended average]]。

恶咒长弓上绘有图案，而且外形和蛇很相近，蛇眼的位置处有一颗小型琥珀宝石。这

Spell Scroll: Comprehend Languages.name: 法术卷轴：通晓语言
Spell Scroll: Comprehend Languages.description:
1 环&Reference[Spell Scroll]

你在法术持续时间内知晓你所听到或看到的所有语言的字面意义。你也可以通过触碰书写的文字来读懂其字面意义。以这种方式阅读每页文字需要花费 1 分钟的时间。这个法术并不能解读符号和暗语，它们不是可书写语言的一种。

Onyx.name: 玛瑙
Onyx.description: 在独角鲸号残骸里发现的一块玛瑙。

Sling Bullet +1.name: 投石索弹丸 +1
Sling Bullet +1.description:
一块经过硬化的石子、骨块或金属块，可用投石索高速投掷。它已被注入了魔法力量。

使用这枚魔法弹药时，你在攻击检定和伤害掷骰上获得加值。一旦命中目标，弹药将失去魔法特性。

Frothy Beer.name: 泡沫啤酒
Frothy Beer.description:
角色获得一个特殊 d6 骰。未来 24 小时内的任何时刻，该角色骰 d20 时，可以额外骰 d6，将结果添加到刚掷出的 d20 中。

Foundry Note

此特性包含一个主动效应（AE），持续时间内，所有 d20 掷骰（包括攻击、豁免和检定）增加 1d6。

Adamantine Ingot.name: 精金锭
Adamantine Ingot.description: 在姆巴拉高原的普普奶奶的茅屋里，在人皮口袋里发现的刻有矮人符文的精金锭。

Spyglass.name: 望远镜
Spyglass.description: 通过望远镜看到的物件要比原先的尺寸大上两倍。

+1 Yklwa.name: 伊克尔瓦之矛 +1
+1 Yklwa.description: 伊克尔瓦（发音：YICK-ul-wah）是楚尔特战士的传统简易近战武器。它由 3 尺木柄与最长 18 寸的钢刃或石刃构成，售价 1 GP，命中造成 1d8 穿刺伤害。虽具投掷属性，但平衡性不佳（射程 10/30 尺）。

Black Opal Crown.name: 黑蛋白石之冠
Black Opal Crown.description: 黑蛋白石之冠曾经戴在耐色瑞尔大奥术师萨达莫尔的头上。传说中萨达莫尔看到他的冠冕的蛋白石上倒映出了人类深不见底的罪恶。对此感到绝望的他制作了一个名为湮灭法球的灭世装置，企图吞噬这个世界，最终却被自己的创造物所毁灭。

Canoe.name: 独木舟
Canoe.description: 一艘独木舟可以在南扎路港以 50 GP的价格购买。它能承载最多 6 个中型生物，最大速度为每小时 2 英里。除此之外，它的数据和划艇（见《城主指南》第 5 章）相同。

Diamond.name: 钻石
Diamond.description: 在一头成年绿龙（生前被称为“毒针”的巨龙）的遗骸中发现了一颗钻石。

Random Gemstone.name: 随机宝石
Random Gemstone.description: 在南吉落尔花园的宝塔时，你会获得一颗宝石。

Gold Bracelet.name: 金手镯
Gold Bracelet.description: 在南吉落尔花园的宝塔中发现的一只绘有图案的金色手镯，其形状宛如羽蛇。。

Gold Chain.name: 黄金锁链
Gold Chain.description: 用在火种的财宝中发现的黄金打造的，一条黄金制成带项链的龙形奖章和一条链子。

Gold Dust.name: 金粉
Gold Dust.description: 在基尔·萨巴隐修地的卫生间中发现的金粉。

Kurtulmak Statue.name: 库尔图玛克雕像
Kurtulmak Statue.description: 在巨龙之心矿井中发现的一尊 3 尺高的狗头人神祇库尔图玛克的雕像，该雕像由金属、玻璃、木材和石头等多种材料制成。

Mbala Sack.name: 人皮口袋
Mbala Sack.description: 在姆巴拉发现的一个用人皮制成的麻袋，里面装有 6 颗玛瑙（每颗 50 GP）、一张通晓语言法术卷轴和以及10 块刻有矮人符号的精金锭（每块 10 GP）。

Medallion.name: 大奖章
Medallion.description: 在耶路克村中发现的一枚格拉斯塔布女王的青铜和精金制成的奖章、刻有“沃恩”字样的奖章。

toaCh2PagodaBrac.name: 金手镯
toaCh2PagodaBrac.description: 在贾哈卡锚地的仓库中发现的一只金手镯。

Small Box.name: 小盒
Small Box.description: 在基尔·萨巴隐修地的阿莎尔的私人房间中，于床底下发现的一个小盒子，内有四瓶易被误认为是治疗药水的剧毒药。

Tinder’s Horde.name: 火种的财宝
Tinder’s Horde.description: 火种的财宝包括 3,300 GP、15,000 SP、45,000 CP、一柄绣着金线的剑鞘（25 GP）、一条黄金制成带项链的龙形奖章（50 GP）、一盏嵌有玉石的铜杯（100 GP），以及一瓶高等治疗药水。

Turtle Shell Crystal.name: 龟壳晶体
Turtle Shell Crystal.description: 在鳄龟海湾中的一只巨鳄龟的壳上发现的一块水晶。

Zaroum Al-Saryak’s Coat.name: 扎如姆·艾萨亚克的大衣
Zaroum Al-Saryak’s Coat.description: 扎如姆·艾萨亚克的大衣上缝着闪闪发光的宝石。

Copper Mug.name: 铜杯
Copper Mug.description: 在火种的财宝中发现的一盏嵌有玉石的铜杯。

Discarded Backpack.name: 废弃背包
Discarded Backpack.description: 姆巴拉洞穴后是两具被吃掉了一半的探险家尸体。两具尸体附近有一个废弃背包，装着一柄镀银匕首、一瓶高等治疗药水和一个腰包，腰包里有 6 GP。

Electrum Goblet.name: 镍银高脚杯
Electrum Goblet.description: 在贾哈卡锚地的仓库中发现的一个镍银高脚杯。

Gold-Embroidered Scabbard.name: 绣着金线的剑鞘
Gold-Embroidered Scabbard.description: 在火种的财宝中发现的一柄绣着金线的剑鞘。

Kakarol’s Horde.name: 卡卡罗尔的财宝
Kakarol’s Horde.description: 在奥姆的废弃集市中，你找到了卡卡罗尔的财宝，其中有 30 GP、250 SP、1,800 CP、一个彩色的蜻蜓状玻璃雕像（25 GP）、四枚血玉髓（每枚 50 GP）以及一瓶高等治疗药水。

Tiger Eye Gemstone.name: 虎眼宝石
Tiger Eye Gemstone.description: 在奥博娜卡神社发现的一颗虎眼宝石。

Dragonfly Statuette.name: 蜻蜓状玻璃雕像
Dragonfly Statuette.description: 在奥姆的座废弃集市中，你发现的一个彩色的蜻蜓状玻璃雕像。

Electrum Platter.name: 金盘
Electrum Platter.description: 在奥姆的露天剧场中发现的现一个刻有楚尔特飨宴仪式的金盘。

Decorated Tapestry.name: 装饰挂毯
Decorated Tapestry.description: 在奥姆的废弃集市中，你发现卡卡罗尔披着一条 6 尺长的破烂挂毯当作斗篷，挂毯上装饰着由石榴石点缀的金刚鹦鹉图案。

Amethyst Gemstone.name: 紫水晶宝石
Amethyst Gemstone.description: 在拉兹·纳斯的巢穴中找到了三颗紫水晶宝石中的一颗，这些宝石曾被用作木雕涂漆的沼喉怪雕像的眼睛。该巢穴位于暗夜巨蛇神殿内。

Amnian Doublet.name: 安姆短上衣
Amnian Doublet.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿中的拉兹·纳斯的巢穴中发现的一件配有腰包并镶有珠宝的安姆短上衣。

Brass Key.name: 黄铜钥匙
Brass Key.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿中发现的一把黄铜钥匙。

Bronze Syringe.name: 青铜注射器
Bronze Syringe.description:
佐坡尔携带一支青铜注射器，内含三剂混合毒药。

以一个动作，他可用注射器发动近战武器攻击（[[/attack +3]]命中），命中时造成 1 点穿刺伤害并注入一剂毒药。

被注入毒药的生物须进行DC 14体质豁免，失败则受[[/damage average activity=Gp56t5S2YILsDaM9]]（3d6）毒素伤害，成功则伤害减半；无论结果如何，该生物都会陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒}1 小时。

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 无论豁免是否成功，该生物都会陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒}1 小时。

Candlesticks.name: 烛台
Candlesticks.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的后宫中发现的两个金色眼镜蛇烛台。

Ceremonial Bracers.name: 仪式护腕
Ceremonial Bracers.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的大门处发现的一对刻着蝙蝠花纹的黄金护腕。

Cormyrean Cloak.name: 科米尔斗篷
Cormyrean Cloak.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的拉兹·纳斯的巢穴中发现的一件精美的科米尔斗篷。

Crocodile Skin Pouch.name: 鳄鱼皮腰包
Crocodile Skin Pouch.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的大门处找到的腰包，由鳄鱼皮制成，里面有 28 金币。

Dendar Holy Symbol.name: 丹达尔圣徽
Dendar Holy Symbol.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的芬萨扎的房间中发现的暗夜巨蛇丹达尔的圣徽。

Fenthaza’s Chest.name: 芬萨札的箱子
Fenthaza’s Chest.description: 箱子没有上锁，内有 200 GP、一个绣着星图的黑色皮制箭袋（75 GP）与一柄收在金质刀鞘中的匕首（25 GP），刀鞘上刻着狂奔的丛林动物。

Gemstone.name: 宝石
Gemstone.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿中的拉兹·纳斯的巢穴中发现的宝石。

Hand Mirror.name: 手镜
Hand Mirror.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的奴隶洞穴中发现的伊撒尔的金手镜。

Headdress.name: 头饰
Headdress.description: 这件头饰是在暗夜巨蛇神殿的奴隶洞穴中发现的伊撒尔的头饰，他的红布头饰上缝有孔雀石宝石。

Iron Key.name: 铁钥匙
Iron Key.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的奴隶洞穴中发现的铁钥匙

Jade Trinket Box.name: 玉佩盒
Jade Trinket Box.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的后宫中找到的一个形似金色卷叶捕蝇草的玉佩盒。

Large Cushion.name: 大软垫
Large Cushion.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的拉兹·纳斯的巢穴中发现的一个铺着图拉米丝绸的大软垫。

Moonshae Harp.name: 月影岛竖琴
Moonshae Harp.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的拉兹·纳斯的巢穴中发现的一把镀金的月影岛竖琴。

Ring of Keys.name: 钥匙串
Ring of Keys.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的芬萨札的房间中发现的一串钥匙。

Sembian Wine Flask.name: 桑比亚酒瓶
Sembian Wine Flask.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的拉兹·纳斯的巢穴中发现的一个桑比亚酒瓶。

Mesmerizing Incense.name: 迷幻熏香
Mesmerizing Incense.description:
点燃一块熏香会散发出一团浓雾，填充直径 20 尺的球状区域，并随熏香移动。

任何在雾中开始其回合且需要呼吸空气的生物，须进行DC 16 体质豁免，失败则陷入梦魇般的恍惚，虽保持清醒但&；Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒}。蛇人亦会受此幻觉影响。

该效果在生物离开雾气后仍持续 1 小时，或被@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{次级复原术}等类似魔法解除。

Dreamlike Stupor.name: 如梦恍惚
Dreamlike Stupor.description: 你陷入充斥噩梦幻景的恍惚状态，虽保持清醒，但被视为中毒。即使蛇人也受此幻觉影响；该效果在生物离开雾气后仍持续 1 小时，或直到其接受@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{次级复原术}或类似魔法为止

Tiara.name: 冕状头饰
Tiara.description: 在暗夜巨蛇神殿的后宫中发现的一件由两条白金毒蛇缠绕而成的头饰，蛇眼为黄玉。

Tortoise-Shell Shield.name: 龟甲盾牌
Tortoise-Shell Shield.description: 这面龟甲盾牌曾属于瑟克洛克，他是暗夜巨蛇神殿军械库的护卫。

Bahamut Holy Symbol.name: 巴哈姆特圣徽
Bahamut Holy Symbol.description: 在九神之墓中的一具龙裔遗骸上发现的一个巴哈姆特的圣徽。

Black Crystal Key.name: 黑色水晶钥匙
Black Crystal Key.description: 接受者获得九命护咒。当你因受到伤害而生命值降至 0 时，可选择改为降至 1 点。此护咒可使用九次，随后消失。

Blue Crystal Key.name: 蓝色水晶钥匙
Blue Crystal Key.description: 接受者获得水晶之心护咒。该护咒使你免疫非魔法攻击的穿刺和挥砍伤害，但获得钝击易伤。该护咒持续 10 天后消失。

Arcane Lore Book.name: 奥法知识巨著
Arcane Lore Book.description: 在九神之墓的血红图书馆中发现的这本关于奥法知识的精装书。

Bronze Mask.name: 青铜面具
Bronze Mask.description: 在九神之墓中发现的威瑟斯的青铜面具。

Carnelian.name: 红玛瑙
Carnelian.description: 在九神之墓中的一位名为布里克斯顿勋爵的已故冒险者的腰包中发现的一颗红玛瑙宝石。

Chameleon Statuette.name: 变色龙雕像
Chameleon Statuette.description: 在九神之墓的眼魔宝库中发现的一只嵌着可变色的水晶珠的黏土制变色龙雕像。

Manual of Clay Golems.name: 粘土魔像手册
Manual of Clay Golems.description:
奇物

此典籍记载了制作@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.YOqhbf8WsX0jH9Fu]{粘土魔像}所需的全部信息与咒式。唯有拥有至少两个 5 环法术位的施法者才能解读并使用该手册；若不具备此条件却强行阅读，将立刻受到 6d6 点心灵伤害。

制造粘土魔像需连续工作 30 日，期间每日休息不得超过 8 小时，且必须始终将手册置于手边随时参阅，不得中断。此外，还须花费 65,000 GP 购置材料。

魔像完工之际，手册会在魔焰中焚毁；将其灰烬撒于魔像之上，魔像即刻活化，并完全服从你的控制，理解并执行你的口头命令。

Gold Cloak Pin.name: 金色斗篷别针
Gold Cloak Pin.description: 在九神之墓中的帕帕扎图之墓中获得了一枚金色斗篷别针。

Purple Crystal Eye.name: 淡紫色水晶眼球
Purple Crystal Eye.description: 在九神之墓中的映像走廊发现的这颗淡紫色水晶眼球。

toaCh5Diamond000.name: 钻石
toaCh5Diamond000.description: 获得了一颗足够大的钻石，可用作@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.AGFMPAmuzwWO6Dfz]{死者复活}法术的材料成分。

Eye of Zaltec.name: 扎尔泰克之眼
Eye of Zaltec.description: 数世纪以来，这块拳头大的红宝石一直位于马兹特克帝国首都尼克萨拉城的大金字塔最高处。这颗宝石是扎尔泰克教会的圣遗物，它那匕首般的尖头曾刺穿无数祭品的心脏。

Assorted Gems.name: 混合宝石
Assorted Gems.description: 在九神之墓的高姆（乳齿象）雕像的象牙上取下的各种宝石。

Child’s Bat Mask.name: 儿童蝙蝠面具
Child’s Bat Mask.description: 在九神之墓的眼魔宝库中发现了一副彩绘黄金面具，大小只适合儿童穿戴，形状像蝙蝠脸。

Gold Coronet.name: 黄金王冠
Gold Coronet.description: 在九神之墓的眼魔宝库中发现的一顶形如章鱼、以珍珠母为眼的黄金王冠。

Gold Crystal Key.name: 金色水晶钥匙
Gold Crystal Key.description: 接受者获得金石感官护咒。当该护咒持续时，你可以用一个动作，通过气味来确定 30 尺内的贵重金属和石头的位置，比如硬币和宝石。该护咒持续 3 天后消失。

Gold Cup.name: 金杯
Gold Cup.description: 在九神之墓的帕帕扎图之墓中发现的一盏金杯。

Child’s Monkey Mask.name: 儿童猴子面具
Child’s Monkey Mask.description: 在九神之墓的眼魔宝库中发现了一副彩绘黄金面具，大小只适合儿童穿戴，形状像猴脸。

Child’s Parrot Mask.name: 儿童鹦鹉面具
Child’s Parrot Mask.description: 在九神之墓的眼魔宝库中发现的一副彩绘黄金面具，大小只适合儿童穿戴，形状像鹦鹉脸。

Golden Pendant.name: 黄金吊坠
Golden Pendant.description: 在诡神走廊的安珂雕像上发现的一个外形酷似眼睛的黄金吊坠。

Gold Spectacles.name: 金边眼镜
Gold Spectacles.description: 在九神之墓的恐怖帘幕中发现的一副变形的金边眼镜。

Gold Torc.name: 金项圈
Gold Torc.description: 在九神之墓的帕帕扎图之墓中发现的一串金项圈。

Green Crystal Key.name: 绿色钥匙
Green Crystal Key.description: 接受者获得肿胀鬼婆护咒。该护咒让你能用一个动作吐出一只@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.EZgiprHXA2D7Uyb3]{青蛙}。青蛙理解并听从你的命令。该护咒使用 3 次后消失。

History Book.name: 历史文献
History Book.description: 在九神之墓的血红图书馆中发现的这本历史文献。

Horn-Rimmed Spectacles.name: 角框眼镜
Horn-Rimmed Spectacles.description:
在九神之墓的血红图书馆中发现的奥登罗斯魔的角框眼镜。

这副眼镜是一把钥匙，能打开一扇位于印记城的传送门，该传送门是通往世外桃源位面的双向门，但冒险者们并不知道这扇传送门的具体位置。对眼镜施放法术通晓传奇 Legend Lore 能揭露其钥匙的作用，如果把它卖给法师或智者，它们的潜在价值就会提升至 2,500 GP。

Hornet Mask.name: 大黄蜂面具
Hornet Mask.description: 在九神之墓的纳帕卡女王石棺中发现的一张黄金制的大黄蜂面具。

Ivory Back Scratcher.name: 象牙痒痒挠
Ivory Back Scratcher.description: 在九神之墓的龙裔的骸骨旁发现的一个恐龙爪形的象牙痒痒挠，它形似恐龙的爪子。

Leather Eye Patch.name: 皮眼罩
Leather Eye Patch.description: 在九神之墓的恐怖帘幕中发现的一副嵌有血玉髓的皮眼罩。

Gold Leaf.name: 金箔
Gold Leaf.description: 在九神之墓的乳齿象雕像的象牙上剥下的金箔。

Horn-Rimmed Spectacles (Mundane).name: 角框眼镜（平凡）
Horn-Rimmed Spectacles (Mundane).description: 在九神之墓的血红图书馆中发现的奥登罗斯魔的角框眼镜。

Navel of the Moon.name: 月亮之脐
Navel of the Moon.description: 传说中这块抛光的蛋形石头是由月亮的一部分雕刻而成，是卡林港的统治者西尔帕夏送给他的水手女儿的礼物。传说持有这块石头的人总能找到其所爱之人。

Opalescent Bracelet.name: 乳白色手镯
Opalescent Bracelet.description: 在九神之墓的安珂的棺材中发现的一串乳白色手镯。

Peridot Gemstone.name: 黄头巾
Peridot Gemstone.description: 在九神之墓的艾金之墓中发现的一件镶嵌着一颗橄榄石的黄色头巾。

Platinum Hair Pin.name: 铂金发夹
Platinum Hair Pin.description: 在九神之墓的恐怖帘幕中发现的一枚铂金发夹。

Purple Crystal Key.name: 紫色钥匙
Purple Crystal Key.description: 接受者获得伤患护咒。该护咒能让你重新长出一处残缺肢体或器官，如一条胳膊、一只脚或一只眼睛。该护咒使用 1 次后消失。

Red Crystal Key.name: 红色钥匙
Red Crystal Key.description: 接受者获得食尸鬼护咒。该护咒允许你用一个动作来吃下一口刚刚死亡不超过 1 天的类人生物的肉。当你这样做时，你恢复 3d8 + 3 点生命值。该护咒使用 3 次后消失。

Sapphire Cord.name: 蓝宝石辫子
Sapphire Cord.description: 在九神之墓中发现的一条蓝宝石辫子，它曾属于被囚禁在瓶子中的土巨灵珂希玛·阿瓦齐尔。

Skeletal Songbird.name: Skeletal Songbird骸骨夜莺
Skeletal Songbird.description: 在九神之墓中威瑟斯的办公室中发现的一只骸骨夜莺。

Belly Button Gemstone.name: 肚脐宝石
Belly Button Gemstone.description: 在九神之墓中发现的一块形如肚脐的黄玉，它曾属于被囚禁在瓶子中的土巨灵珂希玛·阿瓦齐尔。

Neverending Ink Pot.name: 永不干涸的墨水瓶
Neverending Ink Pot.description: 在戴夫林·巴希尔的尸体上发现的一个永不干涸的墨水瓶。

Charm of Restoration.name: 复原护咒
Charm of Restoration.description: 该护咒有 6 发充能。你可以使用动作并消耗充能来施展以下法术：@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{高等复原术}（4 发充能）或@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{次等复原术}（2 发充能）。所有充能耗尽后，该护咒便会从你身上消失。

Clay No-Face's Charm.name: 无脸粘土的护咒
Clay No-Face's Charm.description: 携带无脸粘土时，你无需饮食和呼吸。携带该玩偶时，该增益持续 30 天。之后该护咒从你身上消失。

Essence of Ether (Inhaled).name: 乙醚精（吸入型）
Essence of Ether (Inhaled).description:
吸入这种毒药的生物必须成功通过一次[[/save format=long]]，否则将陷入&Reference[poisoned apply=false]{中毒}状态 8 小时。以此中毒期间该生物还会陷入&Reference[unconscious apply=false]{昏迷}。该生物会在受到伤害、或是其他生物用一个动作来将其摇醒时苏醒。

吸入。吸入型毒药是吸入时生效的粉末或气体。吹散粉末或释放气体可以让一处 5 尺立方区域内的生物受其效应影响。其产生的云雾在此后将立即消散。由于其毒素会影响鼻粘膜、泪腺、还有身体的其他部位，所以即使屏住呼吸也不能使吸入型毒药无害化。

toaGoldBracelet0.name: 金手镯
toaGoldBracelet0.description: 在贾哈卡锚地的仓库中发现的一只金手镯。

Gold Tankard.name: 黄金酒杯
Gold Tankard.description: 在九神之墓的腐朽大厅中发现的一个黄金酒杯，酒杯上刻着一张悲伤的脸，当酒杯注满时，这张脸会露出微笑。

Insect Repellent Salve.name: 驱虫剂
Insect Repellent Salve.description:
在南扎路港可以买到两种形式的驱虫剂：熏香块或药膏。贸易亲王克薇欧泽垄断着这两样物品的销售。两种驱虫剂都无法驱离《怪物图鉴》附录 A 中所描述的巨型昆虫或肮脏的昆虫集群。

药膏为葫芦装或瓶装，售价 1 GP，内含 20 剂无味油膏。一剂药膏能保护涂抹者 24 小时内不受普通昆虫伤害。该药膏防水，不会被雨水冲走。

Mask of the Beast.name: 野兽面具
Mask of the Beast.description: 这副木制面具被雕刻成野兽般的脸孔，拥有 3 发充能。带着面具的时候，你可以用一个动作消耗 1 发充能，使用面具施放@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.hDOENzjuj5WpLq7B]{化兽为友}。该面具在黎明时恢复所有被使用过的充能次数。

Jade Crocodile Key.name: 翡翠鳄鱼钥匙
Jade Crocodile Key.description: 在九神之墓的太阳女王墓中发现的一柄形似鳄鱼的小巧翡翠钥匙

Joho's Charm.name: 约霍的护咒
Joho's Charm.description: 携带约霍时，它的增益使你如同戴着一顶@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.rY9sRFQp5CFSfsat]{通晓语言头盔}。携带该玩偶时，该增益持续 7 天。之后该护咒从你身上消失。

Talisman of the Sphere.name: 法球护符
Talisman of the Sphere.description:
奇物，传说（需同调）

持握此护符期间，当你为控制@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.2YNqk5zm9jDTvd7q]{湮灭法球}而进行智力（奥秘）检定时，你可将熟练加值翻倍。

此外，若你在回合开始时正控制一个湮灭法球，则可使用一个动作使其上升 10 尺，再加上 10 × 你的智力调整值的尺数。

你的智力调整值为[[lookup @abilities.int.mod]]

Bonus: Arcana Check.name: 加值：奥秘检定
Bonus: Arcana Check.description: 持握此护符期间，你要操控湮灭法球而作的智力（奥秘）检定可以加上双倍熟练加值。

Midnight Tears (Ingested).name: 午夜之泪（服用）
Midnight Tears (Ingested).description:
服用此毒药的生物不会立即出现异样，其症状会一直潜伏到午夜钟声敲响时。若毒素在午夜之前未被中和，该生物须进行DC 17 体质豁免，失败则受到[[/damage 9d6]]毒素伤害，成功则伤害减半。

服用。服用型毒药必须让生物吞下一整个剂量才能发挥效应。这一剂量可以被施放于食物或液体中。你也可以设定剂量不足的毒药只能发挥更小的效应。如在豁免上有优势或是豁免失败后只受一半的伤害。

Moldy Chest.name: 发霉木箱
Moldy Chest.description: 在燃指峰发现的四个发霉木箱。

Moonstone.name: 月长石
Moonstone.description: 在九神之墓的莎根比之墓中发现的一块月长石。

Moradin’s Gauntlet.name: 摩拉丁之护臂
Moradin’s Gauntlet.description: 楚尔特的矮人们称它为“摩拉丁之护臂”，而且它通常穿着在赫拉克玛尔城的监工们手上。

Music Box.name: 音乐盒
Music Box.description: 在九神之墓的莎根比之墓中激活陷阱时发现的一个精美音乐盒

Onyx Figurine.name: 玛瑙雕像
Onyx Figurine.description: An onyx figurine depicting chwingas was discovered in the stirge cave at Firefinger.

Pouch of Assorted Gems.name: Pouch of Assorted Gems
Pouch of Assorted Gems.description: A pouch of assorted gems found on a dead templar in the latrines of Camp Righteous.

Rain Catcher.name: Rain Catcher
Rain Catcher.description: A rain catcher is a simple contraption consisting of a 5-foot-square leather tarp and a wooden frame with legs. When the tarp is stretched across the wooden frame, it forms a basin that can catch 2 gallons of drinking water per inch of rainfall and hold up to 8 gallons. The tarp and wooden frame fold up for easy transport. A rain catcher costs 1 gp and weighs 5 pounds.

toaRuby000000000.name: Ruby
toaRuby000000000.description: A ruby found on a dead templar in the latrines of Camp Righteous.

toaSerpentVenom0.name: Serpent Venom (Injury)
toaSerpentVenom0.description:
This poison must be harvested from a dead or incapacitated giant poisonous snake. A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Injury. Injury poison can be applied to weapons, ammunition, trap components, and other objects that deal piercing or slashing damage and remains potent until delivered through a wound or washed off. A creature that takes piercing or slashing damage from an object coated with the poison is exposed to its effects.

Velociraptor Skull Box.name: Velociraptor Skull Box
Velociraptor Skull Box.description: Needle hid the following items in the alcove: a purse made from triceratops hide, a small box made from two velociraptor skulls cleverly fitted together, and a hollow dinosaur bone with a wax plug at one end. The purse contains 55 gp, 800 sp, and three blue quartz rings (10 gp each). The skull box is worth 12 gp and contains a wand of fear and two diamonds (500 gp each). The hollow dinosaur bone contains five +1 sling bullets.

Skull Chalice of Ch’gakare.name: Skull Chalice of Ch’gakare
Skull Chalice of Ch’gakare.description: This jeweled goblet was crafted from the skull of a long-dead Omuan king and served as a symbol of office for the royal line of Omu. The legendary Chultan hero Ch’gakare (pronounced chuh-GAH-kah-ree) is said to have beheaded the king after escaping the Nine Hells on the back of a mastodon.

Strawbundle's Charm.name: Strawbundle's Charm
Strawbundle's Charm.description: While you have Strawbundle in your possession, this charm allows you to cast the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.PQuEgKyCdovOvhqN]{etherealness} spell as an action, no components required. After it is used three times, the charm vanishes.

I'jin.name: I'jin
I'jin.description:
I'jin

(pronounced EYE-jin)

I'jin, the Almiraj, is fickle and unpredictable.

Flaw

While inhabited by I'jin, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I never stick to a plan.

Power

While I'jin inhabits you, your Dexterity score becomes 23 unless it is already higher.

Kubazan.name: Kubazan
Kubazan.description:
Kubazan

(pronounced KOO-bah-zahn)

Kubazan, the Froghemoth, is wild and spirited.

Flaw

While inhabited by Kubazan, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I am fearless and not afraid to take great risks.

Power

While Kubazan inhabits you, your Strength score becomes 23 unless it is already higher.

Moa.name: Moa
Moa.description:
Moa

(pronounced MOH-ah)

Moa, the Jaculi, is truthful and kind.

Flaw

While inhabited by Moa, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I must always speak the truth.

Power

While inhabited by Moa, you can use an action to turn &Reference[invisible apply=false]. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on your person. The effect ends if you attack, cast a spell, force a saving throw, or deal damage.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: Anything you are wearing or carrying is &Reference[invisible apply=false] as long as it is on your person. The effect ends if you attack, cast a spell, force a saving throw, or deal damage.

Nangnang.name: Nangnang
Nangnang.description:
Nangnang

(pronounced NANG-nang)

Nangnang, the Grung, is selfish and cruel.

Flaw

While inhabited by Nangnang, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I won't share with others.

Power

While inhabited by Nangnang, you can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. You also gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

Nangnang Movement.name: Nangnang Movement
Nangnang Movement.description: You can move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. You also gain a climbing speed equal to your walking speed.

Obo'laka.name: Obo'laka
Obo'laka.description:
Obo'laka

(pronounced oh-boh-LAH-kah)

Obo'laka, the Zorbo, is nervous and obsessive.

Flaw

While inhabited by Obo'laka, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I am risk-averse and never deviate from my routine.

Power

While Obo'laka inhabits you, you can attune to one additional magic item. When Obo'laka leaves you, all magic items to which you are attuned are no longer attuned to you.

Additional Attunement.name: Additional Attunement
Additional Attunement.description: You can attune to one additional magic item.

Papazotl.name: Papazotl
Papazotl.description:
Papazotl

(pronounced pah-pah-ZAH-tul)

Papazotl, the Eblis, is shrewd and conniving.

Flaw

While inhabited by Papazotl, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I bow before no one and expect others to do as I command.

Power

While inhabited by Papazotl, you can't be &Reference[surprise apply=false]{surprised}, you gain advantage on all Wisdom checks, and you never take damage from falling.

Papazotl Awareness.name: Papazotl Awareness
Papazotl Awareness.description: You can't be &Reference[surprise apply=false]{surprised}, you gain advantage on all Wisdom checks, and you never take damage from falling.

Shagambi.name: Shagambi
Shagambi.description:
Shagambi

(pronounced shah-GOM-bee)

Shagambi, the Kamadan, is wise and virtuous.

Flaw

While inhabited by Shagambi, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I never show mercy to evildoers.

Power

While inhabited by Shagambi, you can make one extra attack when taking the &Reference[Attack] action on your turn.

Unkh.name: Unkh
Unkh.description:
Unkh

(pronounced UNK)

Unkh, the Flail Snail, is self-absorbed and indecisive.

Flaw

While inhabited by Unkh, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I am incapable of making decisions.

Power

While Unkh inhabits you, your Constitution score becomes 23 unless it is already higher.

Wongo.name: Wongo
Wongo.description:
Wongo

(pronounced WONG-go)

Wongo, the Su-Monster, is violent and erratic.

Flaw

While inhabited by Wongo, you gain the following flaw, which overrides any opposing flaw: I act without concern for the well-being of others.

Power

While inhabited by Wongo, you can use your action to unleash a psionic assault on a creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be &Reference[stunned apply=false] until the end of its next turn.

Stunned.name: Stunned
Stunned.description: The target is &Reference[Stunned apply=false] until the end of its next turn.

Tej, Cask (Fort Beluarian).name: Tej, Cask (Fort Beluarian)
Tej, Cask (Fort Beluarian).description: Tej is an amber-colored, fermented drink made from honey. It’s more common and popular in Chult than beer or ale.

Tej, Cask (Port Nyanzaru).name: Tej, Cask (Port Nyanzaru)
Tej, Cask (Port Nyanzaru).description: Tej is an amber-colored, fermented drink made from honey. It’s more common and popular in Chult than beer or ale.

Tej, Mug (Fort Beluarian).name: Tej, Mug (Fort Beluarian)
Tej, Mug (Fort Beluarian).description: Tej is an amber-colored, fermented drink made from honey. It’s more common and popular in Chult than beer or ale.

Tej, Mug (Port Nyanzaru).name: Tej, Mug (Port Nyanzaru)
Tej, Mug (Port Nyanzaru).description: Tej is an amber-colored, fermented drink made from honey. It’s more common and popular in Chult than beer or ale.

Torm Holy Symbol.name: Torm Holy Symbol
Torm Holy Symbol.description: A silver holy symbol of Torm on a leather thong was found on the wall of a burned-out shrine in Camp Righteous.

Torpor (Ingested).name: Torpor (Ingested)
Torpor (Ingested).description:
A creature subjected to this poison must succeed on a [[/save format=long]] or become &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for [[/r 4d6]] hours. The poisoned creature is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}.

Ingested. A creature must swallow an entire dose of ingested poison to suffer its effects. The dose can be delivered in food or a liquid. You may decide that a partial dose has a reduced effect, such as allowing advantage on the saving throw or dealing only half damage on a failed save.

Foundry Note

By default, the duration of the condition is set at a minimum of 4 hours. You can adjust the duration of the Active Effect by opening it up in the Effects tab and then selecting the Duration tab. Change the value (in seconds), then click on Submit Changes.

Poisoned & Incapacitated.name: Poisoned & Incapacitated
Poisoned & Incapacitated.description: The target is &Reference[poisoned apply=false]{poisoned} for [[/r 4d6]] hours. The poisoned creature is &Reference[incapacitated apply=false]{incapacitated}.

Wyvern Poison (Injury).name: Wyvern Poison (Injury)
Wyvern Poison (Injury).description:
This poison must be harvested from a dead or incapacitated wyvern. A creature subjected to this poison must make a [[/save format=long]], taking [[/damage average]] on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Injury. Injury poison can be applied to weapons, ammunition, trap components, and other objects that deal piercing or slashing damage and remains potent until delivered through a wound or washed off. A creature that takes piercing or slashing damage from an object coated with the poison is exposed to its effects.

Yklwa.name: Yklwa
Yklwa.description: A yklwa (pronounced YICK-ul-wah) is a simple melee weapon that is the traditional weapon of Chultan warriors. A yklwa consists of a 3-foot wooden shaft with a steel or stone blade up to 18 inches long. It costs 1 gp, and it deals 1d8 piercing damage on a hit. Although it has the thrown weapon property, the yklwa is not well balanced for throwing (range 10/30 ft.).

Yuan Ti Racial Traits.name: Yuan Ti Racial Traits
Yuan Ti Racial Traits.description:
Darkvision. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can’t discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

Innate Spellcasting. You know the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.g2u9PYfqWQAyg9OI]{poison spray} cantrip. You can cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.hDOENzjuj5WpLq7B]{animal friendship} an unlimited number of times with this trait, but you can target only snakes with it. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.zMAWdyc8UVb37BK4]{suggestion} with this trait. Once you cast it, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

Magic Resistance. You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Poison Immunity. You are immune to poison damage and the poisoned condition.

Anthropologist.name: Anthropologist
Anthropologist.description:
You have always been fascinated by other cultures, from the most ancient and primeval lost lands to the most modern civilizations. By studying other cultures’ customs, philosophies, laws, rituals, religious beliefs, languages, and art, you have learned how tribes, empires, and all forms of society in between craft their own destinies and doom. This knowledge came to you not only through books and scrolls, but also through first-hand observation — by visiting far-flung settlements and exploring local histories and customs.

Skill Proficiencies: &Reference[Insight], &Reference[Religion]

Languages: Two of your choice

Equipment: A leather-bound diary, a bottle of ink, an ink pen, a set of traveler’s clothes, one trinket of special significance, and a pouch containing 10 gp

Cultural Chameleon

Before becoming an adventurer, you spent much of your adult life away from your homeland, living among people different from your kin. You came to understand these foreign cultures and the ways of their people, who eventually treated you as one of their own. One culture had more of an influence on you than any other, shaping your beliefs and customs. Choose a race whose culture you’ve adopted, or roll on the Adopted Culture table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaAdoptedCultur classes="caption-top" resultLabel="Culture" rollable]

Feature: Adept Linguist

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.items.Item.toabgfFeatureAde caption=false]{Adept Linguist}

Suggested Characteristics

Anthropologists leave behind the societies into which they were born to discover what life is like in other parts of the world. They seek to see how other races and civilizations survive — or why they did not. Some anthropologists are driven by intellectual curiosity, while others want the fame and recognition that comes with being the first to discover a new people, a lost tribe, or the truth about an ancient empire’s downfall.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaPersonalityTr rollable resultLabel="Personality Trait"]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaIdeal00000000 rollable resultLabel="Ideal"]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaBond000000000 rollable resultLabel="Bond"]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaFlaw000000000 rollable resultLabel="Flaw"]

Archaeologist.name: Archaeologist
Archaeologist.description:
An archaeologist learns about the long-lost and fallen cultures of the past by studying their remains — their bones, their ruins, their surviving masterworks, and their tombs. Those who practice archaeology travel to the far corners of the world to root through crumbled cities and lost dungeons, digging in search of artifacts that might tell the stories of monarchs and high priests, wars and cataclysms.

Skill Proficiencies: &Reference[History], &Reference[Survival]

Tool Proficiencies: Cartographer’s tools or navigator’s tools

Languages: One of your choice

Equipment: A wooden case containing a map to a ruin or dungeon, a bullseye lantern, a miner’s pick, a set of traveler’s clothes, a shovel, a two-person tent, a trinket recovered from a dig site, and a pouch containing 25 gp

Dust Digger

Prior to becoming an adventurer, you spent most of your young life crawling around in the dust, pilfering relics of questionable value from crypts and ruins. Though you managed to sell a few of your discoveries and earn enough coin to buy proper adventuring gear, you have held onto an item that has great emotional value to you. Roll on the Signature Item table to see what you have, or choose an item from the table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.dmgSignatureItem rollable resultLabel="Item"]

Feature: Historical Knowledge

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.items.Item.toabgfFeatureHis caption=false]{Historical Knowledge}

Suggested Characteristics

Few archaeologists can resist the lure of an unexplored ruin or dungeon, particularly if such a site is the source of legends or is rumored to contain the treasures and relics of wizards, warlords, or royalty. Some archaeologists plunder for wealth or fame, while others consider it their calling to illuminate the past or keep the world’s greatest treasures from falling into the wrong hands. Whatever their motivations, archaeologists combine the qualities of a scrappy historian with the self-made heroism of a treasure-hunting scoundrel.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaTrait10000000 rollable resultLabel="Personality Trait"]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaIdeal10000000 rollable resultLabel="Ideal"]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaBond100000000 rollable resultLabel="Bond"]

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.toaFlaw100000000 rollable resultLabel="Flaw"]

Adept Linguist.name: Adept Linguist
Adept Linguist.description: You can communicate with humanoids who don’t speak any language you know. You must observe the humanoids interacting with one another for at least 1 day, after which you learn a handful of important words, expressions, and gestures — enough to communicate on a rudimentary level.

Historical Knowledge.name: Historical Knowledge
Historical Knowledge.description: When you enter a ruin or dungeon, you can correctly ascertain its original purpose and determine its builders, whether those were dwarves, elves, humans, yuan-ti, or some other known race. In addition, you can determine the monetary value of art objects more than a century old.

Blue Quartz Ring.name: Blue Quartz Ring
Blue Quartz Ring.description: A blue quartz ring found amongst the corpse of an adult green dragon better known during her lifetime as Needle.

Dreaming Tincture.name: Dreaming Tincture
Dreaming Tincture.description:
Any creatures that drinks a dose of the tincture must succeed on a [[/save con 15 format=long]]. Creatures who are immune to the poisoned condition succeed automatically.

On a failed save, the creature begins to experience illusory sights, sounds, smells, and sensations that seem real. Casting a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{lesser restoration} spell or similar magic on the character ends the effect, which otherwise lasts for [[/r 1d4 + 4]] hours.

Omuan Death Mask.name: Omuan Death Mask
Omuan Death Mask.description: You discovered a golden-painted Omuan death mask at the Amphitheater in Omu.

Bloodstone.name: Bloodstone
Bloodstone.description: At the ruined bazaar in Omu, you discover a bloodstone gem among Kakarol’s treasure hoard.

Platinum Armband.name: Platinum Armband
Platinum Armband.description: 在九神之墓中发现的一两枚雕刻着巨龙的决斗时刻的铂金臂章，它曾属于被囚禁在瓶子中的土巨灵珂希玛·阿瓦齐尔。

Dancing Monkey Fruit.name: Dancing Monkey Fruit
Dancing Monkey Fruit.description:
This rare magical fruit produces enough juice to fill a vial. Any humanoid that eats a dancing monkey fruit or drinks its juice must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or begin a comic dance that lasts for 1 minute. Humanoids that can’t be poisoned are immune to this magical effect.

The dancer must use all its movement to dance without leaving its space and has disadvantage on attack rolls and Dexterity saving throws, and other creatures have advantage on attack rolls against it. Each time it takes damage, the dancer can repeat the [[/save con dc=14]]{saving throw}, ending the effect on itself on a success. When the dancing effect ends, the humanoid suffers the &Reference[poisoned] condition for 1 hour.

Dancing.name: Dancing
Dancing.description:
The dancer must use all its movement to dance without leaving its space and has disadvantage on attack rolls and Dexterity saving throws, and other creatures have advantage on attack rolls against it.

Each time it takes damage, the dancer can repeat the [[/save con dc=14]]{saving throw}, ending the effect on itself on a success.

When the dancing effect ends, the humanoid suffers the &Reference[poisoned] condition for 1 hour.

Menga Leaves (1 oz).name: Menga Leaves (1 oz)
Menga Leaves (1 oz).description:
The dried leaves of a menga bush can be ground, dissolved in a liquid, heated, and ingested. A creature that ingests 1 ounce of menga leaves in this fashion regains 1 hit point. A creature that ingests more than 5 ounces of menga leaves in a 24-hour period gains no additional benefit and must succeed on a [[/save con dc=11 format=long]] or fall &Reference[unconscious] for 1 hour. The unconscious creature awakens if it takes at least 5 damage on one turn.

A healthy menga bush usually has [[/gmr 2d6#Ounces of Menga leaves]] ounces of leaves. Once picked, the leaves require 1 day to dry out before they can confer any benefit.

Ryath Root.name: Ryath Root
Ryath Root.description: Any creature that ingests a ryath root gains [[/heal]]. A creature that consumes more than one ryath root in a 24-hour period must succeed on a [[/save con dc=13 format=long]] or suffer the &Reference[poisoned] condition for 1 hour.

Sinda Berries (Cluster).name: Sinda Berries (Cluster)
Sinda Berries (Cluster).description:
These berries are dark brown and bitter. A full-grown sinda berry bush has [[/gmr 4d6#Berries]] berries growing on it. A bush plucked of all its berries grows new berries in [[/gmr 1d4#Regrowth time (Months)]] months. Picked berries lose their freshness and efficacy after 24 hours.

Fresh sinda berries can be eaten raw or crushed and added to a drink to dull the bitterness. A creature that consumes at least ten fresh sinda berries gains advantage on saving throws against disease and poison for the next 24 hours.

Foundry Note

This item's maximum number of uses, rather than its quantity, is used to track the number of berries available for variable consumption amounts. It has been preset with the minimum number of berries found on a bush.

Disease and Poison Resilience.name: Disease and Poison Resilience
Disease and Poison Resilience.description: A creature that consumes at least ten fresh sinda berries gains advantage on saving throws against disease and poison for the next 24 hours.

Wildroot.name: Wildroot
Wildroot.description: Introducing the juice of a wildroot into a poisoned creature’s bloodstream (for example, by rubbing it on an open wound) rids the creature of the &Reference[poisoned] condition. Once used in this way, a wildroot loses this property.

Wukka Nuts.name: Wukka Nuts
Wukka Nuts.description: These fist-sized nuts grow on wukka trees, which are popular haunts for jaculi, su-monsters, and zorbos. A wukka nut rattles when shaken, causing its shell to shed bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. This magical light fades after 1 minute, but shaking the nut again causes the light to reappear. If the shell of the nut is cracked open, it loses its magic.

Illuminated.name: Illuminated
Illuminated.description: The wukka nut shell sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. This magical light fades after 1 minute,

Yahcha.name: Yahcha
Yahcha.description: A yahcha (pronounced YAH-chah) is a harmless, meaty beetle about the size of a human hand, which feeds on worms and maggots. It moves slowly (walking speed 10 feet) and is easy to catch. A creature with @UUID[JournalEntry.toaCh2TheLandOfC.JournalEntryPage.cAVQlvTQ3y2Unkni]{blue mist fever} that eats a raw or cooked yahcha can immediately make a saving throw with advantage against that disease (see “@UUID[JournalEntry.toaCh2TheLandOfC.JournalEntryPage.q88gNSLatuxyV9Yg]{Diseases}”).

Zabou.name: Zabou
Zabou.description:
Zabou mushrooms feed on offal and the rotting wood of dead trees. If handled carefully, a zabou can be picked or uprooted without causing it to release its spores.

If crushed or struck, a zabou releases its spores in a 10-foot-radius sphere. A zabou can also be hurled up to 30 feet away or dropped like a grenade, releasing its cloud of spores on impact. Any creature in that area must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be &Reference[poisoned apply=false] for 1 minute.

The poisoned creature’s skin itches for the duration. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Poisoned.name: Poisoned
Poisoned.description: The &Reference[poisoned apply=false] creature’s skin itches for the duration. The creature can repeat the [[/save con dc=10]]{saving throw} at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Gold & Carnelian Ring.name: Gold & Carnelian Ring
Gold & Carnelian Ring.description: A gold ring set with carnelian was discovered in the stirge cave at Firefinger.

Amulet of the Black Skull.name: Amulet of the Black Skull
Amulet of the Black Skull.description:
This amulet is carved from obsidian and shaped like a screaming humanoid skull, with ruby eyes and emeralds for teeth. It hangs from an iron chain necklace.

The amulet has 6 charges and regains 1d6 charges daily at dawn. While wearing the amulet, you can use an action to expend 1 of its charges to transport yourself and anything you are wearing or carrying to a location within 100 feet of you. The destination you choose doesn’t need to be in your line of sight, but it must be familiar to you (in other words, a place you have seen or visited), and it must be on the same plane of existence as you. This effect isn’t subject to the magic restrictions placed on the Tomb of the Nine Gods; thus, the amulet can be used to enter and exit the tomb.

If you aren’t undead, you must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw each time you use the amulet to teleport. On a failed saving throw, the black skull cackles as you are transformed in transit. The transformation takes effect as soon as you arrive at the destination, and is determined randomly by rolling percentile dice and consulting the Black Skull Transformation table.

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.tables.RollTable.dmgBlackSkullTra rollable classes="caption-top" resultLabel="Transformation"]

Bookmark.name: Bookmark
Bookmark.description:
This +3 dagger belongs to @UUID[Actor.hNq59kIhDGqZBGXl]{Artus Cimber} (see @UUID[JournalEntry.toaAppDMonstersA.JournalEntryPage.9gGxLgtmRcNjXZ50]{appendix D}). While you have the dagger drawn, you can use a bonus action to activate one of the following properties:

  • Cause a blue gem set into the dagger’s pommel to shed bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, or make the gem go dark.
  • Turn the dagger into a compass that, while resting on your palm, points north.
  • Cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A4RsPuSvB9wFtz1j]{dimension door} from the dagger. Once this property is used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.
  • Cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.P6f1PPKPd9BCb742]{compulsion} (save DC 15) from the dagger. The range of the spell increases to 90 feet, but it targets only spiders that are beasts. Once this property is used, it can’t be used again until the next dawn.

Ghost Lantern.name: Ghost Lantern
Ghost Lantern.description:
A restless spirit is trapped inside this lantern. While holding the lantern, you can command the spirit as a bonus action to shed bright light in a 30-foot radius and dim light for an additional 30 feet.

While holding the lantern, you can use an action to order the spirit to leave the lantern and duplicate the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.Utk1OQRwYkMkFRD3]{mage hand} spell. The spirit returns to the lantern when the spell ends.

If you fall &Reference[unconscious apply=false] within 10 feet of the lantern, the spirit emerges from it, magically stabilizes you with a touch, and then quickly returns to the lantern.

The spirit is bound to the lantern and can’t be harmed, turned, or raised from the dead. Casting a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm]{dispel evil and good} spell on the lantern releases the spirit to the afterlife and renders the lantern nonmagical.

Ring of Winter.name: Ring of Winter
Ring of Winter.description:
@UUID[Actor.hNq59kIhDGqZBGXl]{Artus Cimber} (see @UUID[JournalEntry.toaAppDMonstersA]{appendix D}) has kept this item in his possession for over a century. The [[lookup @item.name]] is a golden band that resizes to fit snugly on the finger of its wearer. A thin layer of frost coats the outside of the ring, which normal heat can’t melt. The ring feels ice cold to the touch and initially numbs the hand that wears it, but this cold ceases to be felt by one who is attuned to the ring.

The [[lookup @item.name]] is sentient and tries to take control of any creature that wears it (see @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.t6scHTmpmHBTZGTX.JournalEntryPage.YHsuCV4IZZZoyDap#sentient-magic-items]{Sentient Magic Items}). If it succeeds, the ring compels its wearer to cause undue harm to everyone and everything around it, in a cold-hearted attempt to incur the wrath of enemies and bring about the wearer’s doom.

More Details

Control Attempt

[[/save ability=cha dc=12+3 format=long]]. On a failed save, the wielder is &Reference[charmed apply=false]{charmed} by the ring for [[/gmr 1d12#Hours]]{1d12 Hours}

Sentience. The [[lookup @item.name]] is a sentient chaotic evil item with an Intelligence of 14, a Wisdom of 14, and a Charisma of 17. The ring communicates by transmitting emotion to the creature carrying or wielding it, and it has hearing and normal vision out to a range of 60 feet. The ring craves destruction, and it likes inflicting indiscriminate harm on others.

Ability Checks

[[/r 1d20 + 2]]{Intelligence +2}

[[/r 1d20 + 2]]{Wisdom +2}

[[/r 1d20 + 3]]{Charisma +3}

Nondetection. The [[lookup @item.name]] defies attempts to magically locate it. Neither the ring nor its wearer can be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

Frozen Time. As long as you wear the ring, you don’t age naturally. This effect is similar to suspended animation, in that your age doesn’t catch up to you once the ring is removed. The ring doesn’t protect its wearer from magical or supernatural aging effects, such as the Horrifying Visage of a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.qoFEjfrANBdrCP6m]{ghost}.

Cold Immunity. While attuned to and wearing the ring, you have immunity to cold damage and don’t suffer any ill effects from @UUID[JournalEntry.toaAdditionalRul.JournalEntryPage.z3kEKGnocGv15Nht]{extreme cold}.

Magic. The [[lookup @item.name]] has 12 charges and regains all its expended charges daily at dawn. While wearing the ring, you can expend the necessary number of charges to activate one of the following properties:

  • You can expend 1 charge as an action and use the ring to lower the temperature in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you can see within 300 feet of you. The temperature in that area drops 20 degrees per minute, to a minimum of –30 degrees Fahrenheit. Frost and ice begin to form on surfaces once the temperature drops below 32 degrees. This effect is permanent unless you use the ring to end it as an action, at which point the temperature in the area returns to normal at a rate of 10 degrees per minute.

  • You can cast one of the following spells from the ring (spell save DC 17) by expending the necessary number of charges: @UUID[Compendium.dnd-tomb-annihilation.items.Item.DEHllCkN9GLW7cNF]{Bigby’s hand} (2 charges; the hand is made of ice, is immune to cold damage, and deals bludgeoning damage instead of force damage as a clenched fist), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.RpKjTlYASrfqUPVA]{cone of cold} (2 charges), flesh to ice (3 charges; as @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kozNy29b0X6exFhY]{flesh to stone} except that the target turns to solid ice with the density and durability of stone), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WN2LWEljYU6QqnRH]{ice storm} (2 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.MImfWCzEPRMYD3Xp]{Otiluke’s freezing sphere} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.dhqBY4TvVjxVmOZd]{sleet storm} (1 charge), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9gYGkrL6qFTsE6fw]{spike growth} (1 charge; the spikes are made of ice), or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.fzZnVKLmBMo2f5up]{wall of ice} (2 charges).
  • You can expend the necessary number of charges as an action and use the ring to create either an inanimate ice object (2 charges) or an animated ice creature (4 charges). The ice object can’t have any moving parts, must be able to fit inside a 10-foot cube, and has the density and durability of metal or stone (your choice). The ice creature must be modeled after a beast with a challenge rating of 2 or less. The ice creature has the same statistics as the beast it models, with the following changes: the creature is a construct with vulnerability to fire damage, immunity to cold and poison damage, and immunity to the following conditions: &Reference[charmed apply=false], &Reference[exhaustion apply=false], &Reference[frightened apply=false], &Reference[paralyzed apply=false], &Reference[petrified apply=false], and &Reference[poisoned apply=false]. The ice creature obeys only its creator’s commands. The ice object or creature appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of you. It melts into a pool of normal water after 24 hours or when it drops to 0 hit points. In extreme heat, it loses [[/damage 1d10 average]]hit points per minute as it melts. Use the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.rules.JournalEntry.t6scHTmpmHBTZGTX.JournalEntryPage.3RM2KPMlMrSXngN3]{guidelines} in chapter 8 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide to determine the hit points of an inanimate object if they become necessary.

Other Properties. The [[lookup @item.name]] is rumored to possess other properties that can be activated only by an evil being whose will the ring can’t break. Frost giants have long believed that the ring can be used to freeze entire worlds, while a djinni in the service of a Calishite pasha once claimed that the ring could be used to summon and control white dragons, as well as a mighty ice primordial named Cryonax.

Destroying the Ring. The ring is nigh indestructible, resisting even the most intense magical heat. If it is placed on the finger of the powerful archfey known as the Summer Queen, the ring melts away and is destroyed forever.

Chill Area.name: Chill Area
Chill Area.chatFlavor: Temperature in area drops 20 degrees per minute.

Flesh to Ice.name: Flesh to Ice
Flesh to Ice.chatFlavor: Target turns to solid ice with the density and durability of stone.

z4uJAY68jpW4dO5W.chatFlavor: The spikes are made of ice

Nondetection.name: Nondetection
Nondetection.description: Neither the ring nor its wearer can be targeted by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

Frozen Time and Immunity.name: Frozen Time and Immunity
Frozen Time and Immunity.description:
Frozen Time. As long as you wear the ring, you don’t age naturally.

Cold Immunity. While attuned to and wearing the ring, you have immunity to cold damage and don’t suffer any ill effects from extreme cold.

Beast Statistic Changes.name: Beast Statistic Changes
Beast Statistic Changes.description: The ice creature has the same statistics as the beast it models, with the following changes: the creature is a construct with vulnerability to fire damage, immunity to cold and poison damage, and immunity to the following conditions: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and poisoned.

Scorpion Armor.name: Scorpion Armor
Scorpion Armor.description:
This suit of plate armor is fashioned from giant scorpion chitin. While wearing this armor, you gain the following benefits:

  • The armor improves your combat readiness, granting you a +5 bonus to initiative as long as you aren’t &Reference[incapacitated apply=false].
  • The armor doesn’t impose disadvantage on your Dexterity (&Reference[skill=stealth]) checks.
  • The armor doesn’t impose disadvantage on saving throws made to resist the effects of extreme heat (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide).

Curse. This armor is cursed. Whenever you don or doff it, you must make a [[/save ability=con dc=15 format=long]], taking [[/damage 10d10+45 type=poison average]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Only a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{wish} spell can remove the armor’s curse.

Combat Readiness and Heat Resistance.name: Combat Readiness and Heat Resistance
Combat Readiness and Heat Resistance.description:
The armor improves your combat readiness, granting you a +5 bonus to initiative as long as you aren’t &Reference[incapacitated apply=false].

The armor doesn’t impose disadvantage on saving throws made to resist the effects of extreme heat (see chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master’s Guide).

Staff of the Forgotten One.name: Staff of the Forgotten One
Staff of the Forgotten One.description:
[[/attack extended]]. [[/damage extended average]] or [[/damage twoHanded average]].

(requires attunement by a sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)

This crooked staff is carved from bone and topped with the skull of a forgotten archmage whom Acererak destroyed long ago. Etched into the skull’s forehead is Acererak’s rune, which is known on many worlds as a sign of death.

Beneficial Properties. While the staff is on your person, you gain the following benefits:

  • Your proficiency bonus to Intelligence (&Reference[skill=Arcana]) and Intelligence (&Reference[skill=History]) checks is doubled.
  • You can’t be &Reference[blinded apply=false], &Reference[charmed apply=false], &Reference[deafened apply=false], &Reference[frightened apply=false], &Reference[petrified apply=false], or &Reference[stunned apply=false].
  • Undead with a challenge rating of 2 or lower will neither threaten nor attack you unless you harm them.
  • You can wield the staff as a +3 quarterstaff that deals an extra 10 (3d6) necrotic damage on a hit.

Invoke Curse. The [[lookup @item.name]] has 7 charges and regains 1d4 + 3 expended charges daily at dawn. While holding the staff, you can use an action to expend 1 charge and target one creature you can see within 60 feet of you. The target must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=wwlmRBqrIYN7PP0v]] (using your spell save DC) or be cursed. While cursed in this way, the target can’t regain hit points and has vulnerability to necrotic damage. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{remove curse}, or similar spell ends the curse on the target.

The Forgotten One. The bodiless life force of a dead archmage empowers the staff and is imprisoned within it. The rune carved into the staff’s skull protects Acererak from this spirit’s vengeance. Each time a creature other than Acererak expends any of the staff’s charges, there is a [[/r 1d100cs<=50]]{50 percent} chance that the life force tries to possess the staff wielder. The wielder must succeed on a [[/save format=long activity=Xunxk5VSINVzePM0]] or be possessed, becoming an NPC under the DM’s control. If the intruding life force is targeted by magic such as a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm]{dispel evil and good} spell, it becomes trapped in the staff once more. Once it takes control of another creature, the spirit of the dead archmage attempts to destroy the staff.

Destroying the Staff. A creature in possession of the staff can use an action to break it over one knee or a solid surface. The staff is destroyed and releases its remaining magic in an explosion that expands to fill a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on it. Each creature in the area must make a [[/save format=long activity=6FDPmp6M5MGjPED6]], taking [[/damage average activity=6FDPmp6M5MGjPED6]] damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. When the staff is destroyed, the life force of the Forgotten One is released to the afterlife. Where it goes is anyone’s guess.

Casting the staff into a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.2YNqk5zm9jDTvd7q]{sphere of annihilation} destroys both the staff and the life force trapped within it. The staff doesn’t explode if destroyed in this manner, but its destruction causes the sphere to be destroyed as well.

Invoke Curse.name: Invoke Curse
Invoke Curse.chatFlavor: Users other than Acererak may be possessed. See "The Forgotten One".

Undead Ally, Proficiency Bonus, Conditio.name: Undead Ally, Proficiency Bonus, Condition Immunity
Undead Ally, Proficiency Bonus, Conditio.description:
Your proficiency bonus to Intelligence (&Reference[skill=Arcana]) and Intelligence (&Reference[skill=History]) checks is doubled.

You can’t be &Reference[blinded, &Reference[charmed apply=false], &Reference[deafened apply=false], &Reference[frightened apply=false], &Reference[petrified apply=false], or &Reference[stunned apply=false].

Undead with a challenge rating of 2 or lower will neither threaten nor attack you unless you harm them.

Cursed.name: Cursed
Cursed.description: While cursed in this way, the target can’t regain hit points and has vulnerability to necrotic damage. A @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{greater restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{remove curse}, or similar spell ends the curse on the target.

Possessed.name: Possessed
Possessed.description: The target is possessed, becoming an NPC under the DM’s control.

Potion of Water Breathing.name: Potion of Water Breathing
Potion of Water Breathing.description:
Its cloudy green fluid smells of the sea and has a jellyfish-like bubble floating in it.

You can breathe underwater for 1 hour after drinking this potion.

Bedroll.name: Bedroll
Bedroll.description: Roll of cloth used by traveller to sleep in.

Iced Cakes.name: Iced Cakes
Iced Cakes.description:
The character feels energized and gains [[/heal temp]].

Foundry Note

This feature includes an Active Effect (AE) that serves as a reminder but does not automate the aforementioned benefits.

Pouch.name: Pouch
Pouch.description: A cloth or leather pouch can hold up to 20 sling bullets or 50 blowgun needles, among other things. A compartmentalized pouch for holding spell components is called a component pouch. A pouch can hold up to ⅕ cubic foot or 6 pounds of gear.

Ink Bottle.name: Ink Bottle
Ink Bottle.description: A small bottle of ink for writing upon parchment.

Spell Scroll: Resurrection.name: Spell Scroll: Resurrection
Spell Scroll: Resurrection.description:
7th Level &Reference[Spell Scroll]

You touch a dead creature that has been dead for no more than a century, that didn't die of old age, and that isn't undead. If its soul is free and willing, the target returns to life with all its hit points.

This spell neutralizes any poisons and cures normal diseases afflicting the creature when it died. It doesn't, however, remove magical diseases, curses, and the like; if such effects aren't removed prior to casting the spell, they afflict the target on its return to life.

This spell closes all mortal wounds and restores any missing body parts.

Coming back from the dead is an ordeal. The target takes a −4 penalty to all attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks. Every time the target finishes a long rest, the penalty is reduced by 1 until it disappears.

Casting this spell to restore life to a creature that has been dead for one year or longer taxes you greatly. Until you finish a long rest, you can't cast spells again, and you have disadvantage on all attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.
